description: A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Serge version 0.9.0. The vulnerability is due to improper neutralization of input during web page generation in the chat prompt. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted message containing malicious HTML/JavaScript code, which will be stored and executed whenever the chat is accessed, leading to unintended content being shown to the user and potential phishing attacks.
